column2: b'gold is green and $ASA is my biggest loser today ( go figger )  while $CPLP my biggest winner \n\nlooking to add more $RMRM on dips'

b"7% industrial ...... how in heck can that be at almost same disco to BV as say pure GSE $TWO ?\n\nat very least , i'd be ringing register on $ACRE  and buy $RMRM whose portfolio will be 100% post pandemic origination and at 45% disco to what is mostly cash portfolio now"

b'@JJedowney1953 still have a hunch that in 90 days , $RMRM is a home run as conversion to CRE mREIT is complete and they start paying a divvy on the new loans 

$NRZ probably still the safer upside story here 

$CPLP could double its current divvvy and still cover it 200% off current earnings'
b'$RMRM getting noticed for its insane cheapness ..... thot i was going to be able to build into a decent size position before it  ran .....'
